features.title: Featured Capabilities
features.subtitle: With DevQBank, quickly find the questions you need, learn from a quality content stream, save, and share.

search.title: Search & Filtering
search.desc: Fast, accurate search by domain, technology, experience, topic, company, and difficulty tags. Reach the right question in a few clicks with advanced sorting and rich filters.

flow.title: Question & Answer Flow
flow.desc: Draft → review → approve/reject stages ensure a consistent, high‑quality publishing pipeline. Versioning and feedback drive continuous improvement.

oauth.title: OAuth & Roles
oauth.desc: Sign in with email/password, Google, or GitHub; clear and secure authorization with Guest/User/Moderator/Admin roles.

bookmark.title: Bookmarks & Collections
bookmark.desc: Save favorite questions, build thematic collections, share, and revisit anytime.

sponsor.title: Sponsor Support
sponsor.desc: Support via BuyMeACoffee; gain visibility with your logo in the sponsor bar and contribute to the ecosystem.

i18n.title: Multilingual Content
i18n.desc: TR/EN content; online translation workflow, missing translation alerts, and language-aware UI.

auth.signInSubtitle: Continue with your account and explore the question bank.
auth.aboutDesc: A modern community-powered question bank built on real interview questions. Search, filtering, moderation, and collections speed up learning.

aboutBullets.search: Powerful search & filtering by domain/tech/experience tags.
aboutBullets.flow: Draft → review → approve/reject ensures a high-quality flow.
aboutBullets.oauth: Email/password + Google/GitHub sign-in with role-based access.
aboutBullets.bookmark: Save questions and build collections for quick revisit.

stats.title: Community Stats
stats.subtitle: A quick snapshot of the growing question bank.

hero.title: Ready to prepare for interviews with real interview questions?
hero.description: Questions are carefully curated by the community and intelligently filtered by domain, technology, experience, and topic tags. The entire process is managed with transparent moderation and presented with a clean, user‑friendly interface.

badges.b2: Supports OAuth with Google and GitHub.

mock.c1: Covers OOP, Async, and HTTP topics.
mock.c2: Includes SQL and EF Core topics.

cta.title: Join the Community
cta.description: Add questions/answers, vote, and edit. Let's build the cleanest question bank together.

sponsors.title: Support the project
sponsors.description: Contribute to development and get featured in the sponsor bar. Thank you!
